text: The RSD-10 Pioneer ( tr.: raketa sredney dalnosti (RSD) "Pioner"; ) was an intermediate-range ballistic missile with a nuclear warhead, that stayed in the Soviet Union from 1976 to 1988. It carried GRAU designation 15Ж45 (15Zh45). Its NATO reporting name was SS-20 Saber. ==Other websites== * SS-20 - Saber - (MAZ-547A base), RSD-10, Pioneer – Walk around photos * SS-20 Installations Category:Nuclear weapons
title: RSD-10 Pioneer
